content:
Sure, here are ten possible names for your podcast:

1. Bull vs. Bear
2. Market Musings
3. The Great Debate
4. Invested Perspectives
5. The Contrarian Investor
6. Two Cents
7. Money Mavericks
8. The Financial Forecasters
9. Risky Business
10. The Investment Showdown

As for the summary, here's one that could work:

Join old friends Michael and Billy as they debate the latest investment ideas on their new podcast. With over twenty years of friendship, they know each other's strengths and weaknesses like the back of their hand. Michael thinks the world is going to fall in and you should have your money in cash, while Billy thinks markets will have ups and downs and you just need to stay invested for the long term and ignore the news. Their discussions are based on real-life experiences, backed by solid research, and aim to provide listeners with actionable advice and insights into the world of personal finance. Whether you're a seasoned investor or just starting out, you'll find something valuable in each episode of this entertaining and informative podcast. So sit back, relax, and enjoy the Bull vs. Bear debate!
